attributes.action: make Darren Fletcher eligible for the Champions league final,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Darren Fletcher was wrongly red carded in the Champions league semi final, and will now miss the final which is totally unfair. this petitons objective is to raise the profile of the ongoing saga of referees getting in wrong and impacted wrongly on careers! and peoples lives

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
